https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/FC4VsrQvIWUNgVDWDAmP7tT3e4.jpg A group of friends blessed with the privileges of birth and status are about to leave for a short break. Carl is the first to arrive and discovers that the four-star hotel they've booked is nothing more than an ordinary family pension. This means the beginning of social clashes and unexpected approaches. Belhorizon
